  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Politics/2016/0512/Does-Trump-and-Ryan-s-meeting-mean-end-to-GOP-rift">
    <title>Does Trump and Ryan's meeting mean end to GOP rift?</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Politics/2016/0512/Does-Trump-and-Ryan-s-meeting-mean-end-to-GOP-rift</link>
    <description><p>The surprisingly show of unity capped a remarkable week that began with Ryan turning his back on his party's presumptive presidential nominee.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/cysid9zuzIU" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Troopers-suspended-over-pursuit-video-that-shows-pummeling">
    <title>Troopers suspended over pursuit video that shows pummeling</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Troopers-suspended-over-pursuit-video-that-shows-pummeling</link>
    <description><p>Two state troopers were suspended for punching a driver they chased from Massachusetts to New Hampshire on Wednesday.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/g2hDlVWyAbw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Education/2016/0512/Campus-concealed-carry-University-of-Texas-hears-faculty-concerns">
    <title>Campus concealed carry: University of Texas hears faculty concerns </title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Education/2016/0512/Campus-concealed-carry-University-of-Texas-hears-faculty-concerns</link>
    <description><p>The University of Texas System's regents debated at its meeting Thursday if faculty can ban handguns from their offices.&nbsp;</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/5JL_1N-yVsI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/Jobless-claims-hit-highest-level-in-a-year.-What-s-going-on-video">
    <title>Jobless claims hit highest level in a year. What’s going on? (+video)</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/Jobless-claims-hit-highest-level-in-a-year.-What-s-going-on-video</link>
    <description><p>An increase in unemployment applications is often seen as a proxy for layoffs. But economists argue that it is too early to be concerned, saying that the labor market is still strong.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/JZ0xJzA8KWI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/How-the-House-opioid-bill-intends-to-help-veterans">
    <title>How the House opioid bill intends to help veterans</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/How-the-House-opioid-bill-intends-to-help-veterans</link>
    <description><p>The US House of Representatives plans to vote this week on a series of opioid abuse bills. One is aimed at helping veterans, who have been disproportionately affected by the opioids abuse epidemic.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/vD3gF9YTuWE" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/MaybeHeDoesntHitYou-and-the-power-of-online-feminism">
    <title>#MaybeHeDoesntHitYou and the power of online feminism</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/MaybeHeDoesntHitYou-and-the-power-of-online-feminism</link>
    <description><p>Twitter has become a fertile forum to discuss and raise awareness about social justice issues.&nbsp;One hashtag is highlighting the tolls of emotional abuse.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/dKm1mQQ2wO0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/Mortgage-rates-dip-to-lowest-in-three-years-good-news-for-homebuyers">
    <title>Mortgage rates dip to lowest in three years: good news for homebuyers?</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/Mortgage-rates-dip-to-lowest-in-three-years-good-news-for-homebuyers</link>
    <description><p>A record decline in the US for the average rate for a 30-year mortgage comes amid declining homeownership and a middle class that is increasingly migrating to either upper or lower income groups.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/js_HGyYNEfw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Politics/2016/0512/Don-t-like-Clinton-or-Trump-Don-t-blame-them.-video">
    <title>Don't like Clinton or Trump? Don't blame them. (+video)</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Politics/2016/0512/Don-t-like-Clinton-or-Trump-Don-t-blame-them.-video</link>
    <description><p>Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton have historically high unfavorable ratings. That is partly a product of how Americans view government, experts say.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/xJo3WCSf-rg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Education/2016/0512/We-need-to-change-the-way-we-talk-about-bullying-experts-say">
    <title>We need to change the way we talk about bullying, experts say</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Education/2016/0512/We-need-to-change-the-way-we-talk-about-bullying-experts-say</link>
    <description><p>A new report suggests that bullying should be treated as a 'serious public health problem.'</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/2Ef48MRIRxE" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Education/2016/0512/New-Orleans-seeks-post-Katrina-healing-with-new-school-plan">
    <title>New Orleans seeks post-Katrina 'healing' with new school plan</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Education/2016/0512/New-Orleans-seeks-post-Katrina-healing-with-new-school-plan</link>
    <description><p>The Louisiana legislature passed a law this week returning New Orleans schools to local control for the first time since hurricane Katrina. But critics charge that the handover is in name only.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/CSC8c-M7vaI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Military/2016/0512/Torture-at-Abu-Ghraib-Who-will-bear-responsibility">
    <title>Torture at Abu Ghraib: Who will bear responsibility?</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Military/2016/0512/Torture-at-Abu-Ghraib-Who-will-bear-responsibility</link>
    <description><p>A federal court is reexamining whether a civilian contractor can be sued for incidents of torture or whether the US military was ultimately responsible.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/vaTWkHNesEQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/Zimmerman-s-attempt-to-sell-his-gun-It-was-legal-but-was-it-right-video">
    <title>Zimmerman's attempt to sell his gun: It was legal, but was it right? (+video)</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/Zimmerman-s-attempt-to-sell-his-gun-It-was-legal-but-was-it-right-video</link>
    <description><p>George Zimmerman planned to sell the gun he used to kill unarmed teen Trayvon Martin on the auction website gunbroker.com, but the item was no longer available there Thursday.&nbsp;</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/uLPIDHv0R7c" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/Babies-of-the-opioid-epidemic-Bipartisan-bill-sails-through-US-House">
    <title>Babies of the opioid epidemic: Bipartisan bill sails through US House</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/Babies-of-the-opioid-epidemic-Bipartisan-bill-sails-through-US-House</link>
    <description><p>A bill seeking to better support babies born with a dependency on opioid drugs has passed unanimously in the US House of Representatives.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/7B9w09R2KDQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/Are-high-speed-police-chases-worth-the-risk-video">
    <title>Are high-speed police chases worth the risk? (+video)</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/USA-Update/2016/0512/Are-high-speed-police-chases-worth-the-risk-video</link>
    <description><p>A 50-mile, high-speed police chase Wednesday ended in Nashua, N.H.&nbsp;Critics say the risks of high-speed pursuits often outweigh the benefits of an arrest.&nbsp;</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/Vlv4dJGrIDA" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/Seattle-councilwomen-stand-up-to-sexist-backlash">
    <title>Seattle councilwomen stand up to sexist backlash </title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Society/2016/0512/Seattle-councilwomen-stand-up-to-sexist-backlash</link>
    <description><p>The majority of the Seattle City Council voted down a developer's bid to build a NBA arena and unwittingly triggered a gender war.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/zA-BQ715XPo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Is-the-appeal-of-ISIS-waning-in-the-United-States">
    <title>Is the appeal of ISIS waning in the United States?</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Is-the-appeal-of-ISIS-waning-in-the-United-States</link>
    <description><p>There has been a sharp decline in the number of Americans seeking to travel to the Middle East to join the Islamic State militant group, according to statistics shared Wednesday by FBI director James Comey.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/UXvNWPjp6tI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Why-the-second-trial-in-Freddie-Gray-s-case-carries-so-much-weight-video">
    <title>Why the second trial in Freddie Gray's case carries so much weight (+video)</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Why-the-second-trial-in-Freddie-Gray-s-case-carries-so-much-weight-video</link>
    <description><p>Baltimore police officer Edward Nero heads to court Thursday for his role in the 2015 death of Freddie Gray. The ruling in Nero's case has potential implications for the other officers involved as well as future trials of police officers.&nbsp;</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/sWPjmfibjvk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Why-accused-Planned-Parenthood-shooter-can-t-face-trial-just-yet-video">
    <title>Why accused Planned Parenthood shooter can't face trial just yet (+video)</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Justice/2016/0512/Why-accused-Planned-Parenthood-shooter-can-t-face-trial-just-yet-video</link>
    <description><p>Three people were killed and nine others wounded when a gunman stormed a Colorado Planned Parenthood in November. While victims' families are likely ready to move on with the trial, the defendant is not, a judge ruled Wednesday.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/f8CjmeuXZhg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Politics/2016/0512/For-some-Republicans-Trump-presents-moral-dilemma">
    <title>For some Republicans, Trump presents moral dilemma</title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Politics/2016/0512/For-some-Republicans-Trump-presents-moral-dilemma</link>
    <description><p>Donald Trump visits Capitol Hill Thursday. He will find some fellow Republicans who are struggling with the morality of supporting him.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/R0lQA_NG9Kg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
  <item rdf:about="http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Foreign-Policy/2016/0511/FBI-head-says-Islamic-State-brand-losing-power-in-US">
    <title>FBI head says Islamic State brand losing power in US </title>
    <link>http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/Foreign-Policy/2016/0511/FBI-head-says-Islamic-State-brand-losing-power-in-US</link>
    <description><p>FBI Director James Comley did&nbsp;not offer an explanation for the decline, though the&nbsp;FBI&nbsp;has worked aggressively in the last year to curb the group's influence.</p><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/feeds/usa/~4/oR9Yp56S_60" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
  </item>
</rdf:RDF>
